item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Use locationmap for resource resolution. Internal stylesheets exposed via {lm:feeder.transform.*.*}

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Changed the request URI from **/feeder/*.xml to **.rss.xml. Please update your source files accordingly.

item.title: admin update
item.description:
admin update by RDG :
Renamed to bring into line with naming conventions.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Changed the way we identify feeds, now embedded in a feedDescritpor file. This file can later be used to control the rendering of the feed, for example, limit the number of items displayed, add a disclaimer etc.

item.title: admin add
